message: [WARNING] Canteen: Synthetic protein dispenser malfunctioning.
[ALERT] Bunkhouse: Artificial gravity fluctuations detected.

[CRITICAL] Sickbay: Quarantine protocols activated. All personnel report for screening.
[STATUS] Life Support Systems: Oxygen levels optimal.

[ALERT] Gravity Generator: Minor fluctuations detected.
[STATUS] Bunkhouse 1: 5 out of 40 bunks available.

[STATUS] Sickbay: All viruses successfully contained.
[ALERT] Storage: Quantum uncertainty causing inventory discrepancies.
[CRITICAL] Gravity Generator: Power surge detected.
[STATUS] Sickbay: Nanobots successfully eliminating common cold.

[STATUS] Canteen: Nutritional algorithm updated.
